fields.title: Home
fields.content:
What we offer

Explore a wide range of tools available for download via BitTorrent:

  • Sound and Video Editing
  • Multimedia Tools
  • Office Applications
  • Complete Operating Systems

Why choose Bitiso?

  • Trusted Sources: All software is verified and sourced from the original creators.
  • Fast and Efficient: BitTorrent ensures fast downloads without the risk of server outages.
  • Completely Legal: Everything shared here is open-source and free to distribute.

Get Started

Browse our categories and discover the software you need today. View Torrents

fields.content_fr:
Ce que nous offrons

Découvrez une large gamme d'outils disponibles en téléchargement via BitTorrent :

  • Édition Son et Vidéo
  • Outils Multimédias
  • Applications de Bureau
  • Systèmes d'Exploitation Complets

Pourquoi choisir Bitiso ?

  • Sources Fiables : Tous les logiciels sont vérifiés et proviennent des créateurs d'origine.
  • Rapide et Efficace : BitTorrent assure des téléchargements rapides sans risque de pannes serveur.
  • Entièrement Légal : Tout ce qui est partagé ici est open-source et librement distribuable.

Commencez dès maintenant

Parcourez nos catégories et découvrez les logiciels dont vous avez besoin aujourd'hui. Voir les Torrents

fields.title: FAQ
fields.content:
What can I find here?

We offer a wide range of free and open-source software for various purposes, such as:

  • Sound and Video Editing
  • Multimedia Tools
  • Office Applications
  • Operating Systems

Is it legal to download content from here?

Yes, all the content shared here is open-source and can be freely distributed without restrictions.

What is BitTorrent?

BitTorrent is a protocol that allows for efficient file sharing. It enables fast and reliable downloads without depending on a central server.

Is using BitTorrent legal?

Yes, BitTorrent itself is perfectly legal. It’s often used to share legal content, including open-source software, movies, and music.

Why should I download with BitTorrent?

BitTorrent is fast, reliable, and environmentally friendly. With no central point of failure, downloads continue even if some peers go offline.

Is the software on Bitiso virus-free?

Yes. All software is scanned before being uploaded, and it comes directly from the original source, as mentioned in the torrent description.

How can I contribute?

We welcome suggestions for new content or improvements. You can reach out to us at contact [at] bitiso [dot] org.

fields.title: Signature
fields.content:
All torrents on Bitiso.org are cryptographically signed using OpenPGP-compliant signatures by either gpg@bitiso.org or the user who uploaded the torrent. We highly recommend verifying the integrity of each downloaded torrent to ensure its authenticity.

Basic Concepts

Each torrent includes a cryptographic signature from the uploader or Bitiso.org. This signature allows users to verify that the torrent file has not been altered or tampered with after it was originally signed.

The signing and verification process is based on public-key cryptography, which makes it nearly impossible to forge a PGP signature without access to the uploader's private key. If a key is ever compromised, the affected user or Bitiso.org will revoke the old key and re-sign all previously signed torrents with a new key.

To verify the signature, use a PGP tool to match the signature with the public key provided by Bitiso.org or the uploader. This process ensures the integrity of the torrent and helps protect users from potential tampering.

To learn more about how PGP works, please refer to Wikipedia.
fields.content_en:
All torrents on Bitiso.org are cryptographically signed using OpenPGP-compliant signatures by either gpg@bitiso.org or the user who uploaded the torrent. We highly recommend verifying the integrity of each downloaded torrent to ensure its authenticity.

Basic Concepts

Each torrent includes a cryptographic signature from the uploader or Bitiso.org. This signature allows users to verify that the torrent file has not been altered or tampered with after it was originally signed.

The signing and verification process is based on public-key cryptography, which makes it nearly impossible to forge a PGP signature without access to the uploader's private key. If a key is ever compromised, the affected user or Bitiso.org will revoke the old key and re-sign all previously signed torrents with a new key.

To verify the signature, use a PGP tool to match the signature with the public key provided by Bitiso.org or the uploader. This process ensures the integrity of the torrent and helps protect users from potential tampering.

To learn more about how PGP works, please refer to Wikipedia.
fields.content_fr:
Tous les torrents sur Bitiso.org sont cryptographiquement signés en utilisant des signatures compatibles OpenPGP, soit par gpg@bitiso.org, soit par l'utilisateur ayant uploadé le torrent. Nous recommandons fortement de vérifier l'intégrité de chaque torrent téléchargé pour en garantir l'authenticité.

Concepts de base

Chaque torrent inclut une signature cryptographique de l'uploader ou de Bitiso.org. Cette signature permet aux utilisateurs de vérifier que le fichier torrent n'a pas été modifié ou altéré après avoir été signé à l'origine.

Le processus de signature et de vérification repose sur la cryptographie à clé publique, ce qui rend pratiquement impossible de falsifier une signature PGP sans avoir accès à la clé privée de l'uploader. En cas de compromission d'une clé, l'utilisateur concerné ou Bitiso.org révoquera l'ancienne clé et resignera tous les torrents précédemment signés avec une nouvelle clé.

Pour vérifier la signature, utilisez un outil PGP pour comparer la signature avec la clé publique fournie par Bitiso.org ou l'uploader. Ce processus garantit l'intégrité du torrent et aide à protéger les utilisateurs contre toute tentative de falsification.

Pour en savoir plus sur le fonctionnement de PGP, consultez Wikipedia.
